General.Name: Seremban Engineering Bhd
General.Description: Seremban Engineering Berhad engages in the fabrication of process equipment and metal structures in Europe, Malaysia, Singapore, and rest of Asia. It is involved in the design, fabrication, and installation of unfired pressure vessels, reactors, towers and columns, heat exchangers, oil heaters, and deodorizers, as well as receiver, storage, and mixing tanks. The company also engages in the fabrication and erection of steel structure and platforms, as well as piping works, such as carbon steel, stainless steel, and jacketed pipes; civil construction, structural, and architectural works for project and plant expansion; maintenance, services, and shutdown work for plants, machinery parts, and equipment; and castable refectory cement works and utilities piping installation works. The company serves oil and fats, palm oil refineries, water and waste treatment, food, glove, chemical plants, and oil and gas industries. The company was incorporated in 1979 and is headquartered in Seremban, Malaysia. Seremban Engineering Berhad is a subsidiary of MIE Industrial Sdn Bhd.
